document.discussion_title: Chidambaram can't divert it with an aberrant excuse: Rijiju
document.topic_text: Comment Union minister Kiren Rijiju today (April 26) accused former Home Minister P Chidambaram of making a "delirious attempt to escape" in the Ishrat Jahan controversy. He was reacting to Chidambaram's comments on the controversy surrounding the change in affidavits done during the latter's tenure as the Home Minister. BJP's National Secretary Shrikant Sharma said it was a tactics by Congress to divert attention from their conspiracy. He also said Congress has been caught in its own web and stands exposed, and that Congress is the mastermind in fixing Narendra Modi.Facing fire from BJP for alleged "flip-flop" on Ishrat Jahan case, former Home Minister P Chidambaram today hit back saying the affidavit controversy is only to "divert attention" from the real issue, which is whether it was a "fake" encounter or not.
